transArray.content: It's very comfortable and the attitude is very good.

Hello dear guests! Thank you very much for your trust in Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and your choice to stay at this hotel. Thank you very much for your recognition of the service attitude of the front desk staff. You will feel at home when you stay here. I believe that with your support, we will continue to improve the quality of all aspects of the hotel to ensure that you will be happy every time you stay. Gold cups and silver cups are not as good as your satisfactory reputation. All hotel staff sincerely look forward to your every stay! I wish you all the best! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
